TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Do they? Should I believe you?

(also, it's the question)

Mostly, if I am the fore told messenger.

Am I the fore told messenger or were you just told I was the fore told messenger and so just believed I was?

No only if chair speed > Mach 1

why do plants try to create a space empire?

Because plants and fabrics are what makes a civilisation industrial.

How many neutrons are there in one prototn?

Platypus

Why dose pillow attack the attic ocean?

Time to stop drugging that pillow with dose after dose. Does the ocean have an attic?

Anybody know whats going on?

Of course not, and we never will.

 

If you hit your hand with a hammer, will it hurt?

Yes. But if you hit it enough times with the hammer, it won't hurt, but your wrist will instead.

What is hurt?

When the tacos liberate Columbia from the pillow cases

Why woof?

Cuz cuss

What is over there above you?

That is the Crusading Knight that chopped off all his limbs.

What is that below you?

The chair. I'm a chairman of this room.

Why do they not have an octopus on board of ISS?

Because it is too handsy with everybody.

If we are inside the milky way then how do we know what it looks like from the outside?

We can see it reflected in the milk.

Why did they name our galaxy after a chocolate candy?

To make it sound sweeter to explore.

 

Why don't tachyons get speeding tickets for going faster than the speed limit of the universe?

Because nobody can catch them to give them the ticket.

Do Tachyons use Tachometers?

They use Tachos.

What are pjysically Burritons?

Its a hungry proton that ordered a physical burrito.

 

If a neutrino goes on a diet, would that be called a nutrisystem?

Yes, and it will be called a nutrino.

Is electron elected?

No it's negatively recieved by atom as an elected carrier.

 

Is a positron a bike from the movie Tron?

The positron is just a nice and positive particle.

Is its antiparticle negatron?

Autobots assemble, it's Negatron.

If I play around with electron shells can I transmute lead into gold?

Unlikely. But you can extract from the shells the electron cores.

If neutron → neutrino, then proton → pewtrino?

Cat

Dog?

Don'tg!

Is this really that while always?
